The user creates wings out of [[Iron Sand]] that can be used for flight. Using these wings, the user can also generate feathers in the form of [[Iron Sand Marking|homing]] missiles, as well as can combine the wings to form a giant spear.

== Trivia ==
* [[Sasori]] could use his [[Third Kazekage]] [[Third Kazekage (puppet)|puppet]] to [[Iron Sand Gathering Assault|create]] Iron Sand wings for itself, though it never used the wings offensively.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 269, page 10</ref>
** In ''[[Naruto Mobile]]'', the Third Kazekage's [[Summoning: Impure World Reincarnation]] unit is able to use the wings offensively, often creating a single wing and using it as a blade.
